description: Aloha! A ROCKin ICE Hawaiian Shave Ice is a Southern California Gourmet Foodtruck, offering the VERY BEST authentic Hawaiian Shave Ice and other tasty treats. Everything we do is hand-made-to-order after you order it and as you watch. Absolutely NOTHING on our truck is pre-packaged or pre-made. With two trucks, five years experience with every kind of event, and aprox 40,000 Twitter followers, we insist on only the very highest quality and so should you. Offering Hawaiian Shave Ice, Frozen Slushy Lemonades and Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches. Also we INVENTED Espresso Shave Ice with 100% real coffee espresso and french vanilla ice cream on the bottom, better than anybody's Iced Latte. A yummy wake up! Caterings and Corporate Events are our specialty. Contact us to find out how to bring the PARTY and the burning Tiki torches to YOUR next event. ***(For grown-ups we can also do a specialty       BAR MENU because Shave Ice is great with a shot on top     :-)
name: A ROCKin ICE Shave Ice
